==German== {{cardinalbox|de|19|20|21|neunzehn|einundzwanzig|ord=zwanzigste}} ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|zwantzig}} {{qual|obsolete}} * {{l|de|zweinzig}} {{qual|obsolete}} * {{l|de|zweintzig}} {{qual|obsolete}} * {{l|de|zweynzig}} {{qual|obsolete}} * {{l|de|zweyntzig}} {{qual|obsolete}} * {{l|de|zwainzig}} {{qual|obsolete}} * {{l|de|zwaintzig}} {{qual|obsolete}} * {{l|de|zwayntzig}} {{qual|obsolete}} ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|goh|de}} ''[[zweinzug]]'' from an original *''tweintug'', from {{etyl|gem-pro|de}} *''twaintigaz'', {{m|gem-pro|*twai tigiwiz}}. Compare Dutch ''[[twintig]]'', West Frisian {{m|fy|tweintich}}, English ''[[twenty]]'', Danish {{m|da|tyve}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈt͡svant͡sɪç/}} * {{audio|de|De-zwanzig.ogg|audio}} ===Numeral=== {{head|de|numeral}} # {{cln|de|cardinal numbers}} [[twenty]] ====Coordinate terms==== {{de-cardinal}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|zwei}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
